name: Suspicious Child Process of SAP NetWeaver - Linux
description:
Detects suspicious child processes spawned by SAP NetWeaver on Linux systems that could indicate potential
exploitation of vulnerability that allows arbitrary execution via webshells such as CVE-2025-31324.
author: Elastic (idea)
Swachchhanda Shrawan Poudel (Nextron Systems)
false_positives: Legitimate administrative activities such as software updates
query: FROM logs-* metadata _id, _version, _index | WHERE ((process.parent.executable.text rlike ".*/[Jj]2[Ee][Ee]/[Cc][Ll][Uu][Ss][Tt][Ee][Rr]/[Aa][Pp][Pp][Ss]/[Ss][Aa][Pp].[Cc][Oo][Mm]/[Ii][Rr][Jj]/[Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv][Ll][Ee][Tt]_[Jj][Ss][Pp]/[Ii][Rr][Jj]/[Ww][Oo][Rr][Kk].*" or process.parent.executable.text rlike ".*/[Jj]2[Ee][Ee]/[Cc][Ll][Uu][Ss][Tt][Ee][Rr]/[Aa][Pp][Pp][Ss]/[Ss][Aa][Pp].[Cc][Oo][Mm]/[Ii][Rr][Jj]/[Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv][Ll][Ee][Tt]_[Jj][Ss][Pp]/[Ii][Rr][Jj]/[Rr][Oo][Oo][Tt].*") or (process.working_directory.text rlike ".*/[Jj]2[Ee][Ee]/[Cc][Ll][Uu][Ss][Tt][Ee][Rr]/[Aa][Pp][Pp][Ss]/[Ss][Aa][Pp].[Cc][Oo][Mm]/[Ii][Rr][Jj]/[Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv][Ll][Ee][Tt]_[Jj][Ss][Pp]/[Ii][Rr][Jj]/[Ww][Oo][Rr][Kk].*" or process.working_directory.text rlike ".*/[Jj]2[Ee][Ee]/[Cc][Ll][Uu][Ss][Tt][Ee][Rr]/[Aa][Pp][Pp][Ss]/[Ss][Aa][Pp].[Cc][Oo][Mm]/[Ii][Rr][Jj]/[Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv][Ll][Ee][Tt]_[Jj][Ss][Pp]/[Ii][Rr][Jj]/[Rr][Oo][Oo][Tt].*")) and (process.executable.text rlike ".*/[Aa][Ss][Hh].*" or process.executable.text rlike ".*/[Bb][Aa][Ss][Hh].*" or process.executable.text rlike ".*/[Cc][Ss][Hh].*" or process.executable.text rlike ".*/[Dd][Aa][Ss][Hh].*" or process.executable.text rlike ".*/[Kk][Ss][Hh].*" or process.executable.text rlike ".*/[Ss][Hh].*" or process.executable.text rlike ".*/[Tt][Cc][Ss][Hh].*" or process.executable.text rlike ".*/[Zz][Ss][Hh].*" or process.executable.text rlike ".*/[Pp][Yy][Tt][Hh][Oo][Nn].*" or process.executable.text rlike ".*/[Pp][Yy][Tt][Hh][Oo][Nn]2.*" or process.executable.text rlike ".*/[Pp][Yy][Tt][Hh][Oo][Nn]3.*" or process.executable.text rlike ".*/[Pp][Ee][Rr][Ll].*" or process.executable.text rlike ".*/[Rr][Uu][Bb][Yy].*" or process.executable.text rlike ".*/[Cc][Uu][Rr][Ll].*" or process.executable.text rlike ".*/[Ww][Gg][Ee][Tt].*" or process.executable.text rlike ".*/[Nn][Cc].*" or process.executable.text rlike ".*/[Nn][Ee][Tt][Cc][Aa][Tt].*" or process.executable.text rlike ".*/[Nn][Cc][Aa][Tt].*" or process.executable.text rlike ".*/[Ss][Oo][Cc][Aa][Tt].*" or process.executable.text rlike ".*/[Nn][Mm][Aa][Pp].*" or process.executable.text rlike ".*/[Tt][Ee][Ll][Nn][Ee][Tt].*" or process.executable.text rlike ".*/[Aa][Ww][Kk].*" or process.executable.text rlike ".*/[Ss][Ee][Dd].*")
